lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about Y. E. Yang’s victory against Tiger Woods in the P.G.A. Championship referred incorrectly to the career performance of Tom Watson, who led the British Open earlier this summer before faltering. A victory would have given Watson six British Open titles and nine major championships; it would not have been his sixth major title.
